name: SalesStaff
overview:
SalesStaff, LLC provides demand generation services for business-to-business technology companies through the deployment and management of quota-based marketing programs. We research opportunities and successfully secure meetings with key executives on behalf of our client sales teams to expand their sales pipelines and accelerate sales cycles.

SalesStaff is a group of B2B sales outsourcing companies and appointment setting companies providing:

  • B2B telesales
  • B2B lead generation
  • sales appointments and sales appointment generation
  • demand generation
  • by appointment only services
  • B2B sales
  • technology sales leads
  • appointment setting
  • inside sales outsourcing
  • demand generation marketing
  • healthcare sales leads
  • IT sales outsourcing
  • managed services marketing
  • IT marketing services
  • lead nurturing
